channel.title: Caro De Robertis on
channel.description: Recent content in Caro De Robertis on

item.title: The Palace of Eros
item.description: My adjectives for the prose: purple, dense, florid, bloated. It sounds like I’m describing a corpse. DNF @ 15% because none of it is connecting with me, not the first-person Psyche nor the third-person Eros, nor the prose that’s turgid to the point of hyperbole. (Did I just want the chance to deploy the word turgid?
